price: A ako se njih dvoje ipak rastave, Allah će ih, iz obilja Svoga, neovisnim učiniti. Allah je neizmjerno darežljiv i mudar.
arabic: وَإِن يَتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ ٱللَّهُ كُلّٗا مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-in yatafarraqā yugh'ni al-lahu kullan min saʿatihi wakāna al-lahu wāsiʿan ḥakīman
